mapper.update: update employee set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_number = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, username, password, phone, sex, id_number, status, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user from employee where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, name, username, password, phone, sex, id_number, status, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user from employee
